I didn't saw it here so if it is a double then move or delete..

I would like to have any options in VAB to temporarily hide already used parts on actual rocket (without moving or de-attaching parts a side), to improve acces to points covered by actual parts.

Hiding could be by previous select for that parts by pointing on them or stage list.

I mostly seeking this feature when i have to modify some internal parts and does not have (view)access to them when moving camera and zoom is just not enough.

Hidden parts will be only invisible in construction space (and possibly marked in stage list if present),and un-touchable for a time (switch button maybe?)and if there is any colision than the part will stay red..

Picture describes, green sqare is selection for part to hide (only model picture - this could be easily done in this case).

I really quite like this - much better than having to carefully clip the camera through parts to see what you're doing - or even removing parts just to get at what you're doing.

When tweakables are implemented, I think a right click "Hide" option would be great - maybe not fully invisible, just ghosted out (similar to unconnected parts), and unclickable other than right click to unhide.
